thread.title: Rentex Computer & Audio Visual Rentals Makes Inc. 5000 for the Second Consecutive Year as One of America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies
thread.title_full: Rentex Computer & Audio Visual Rentals Makes Inc. 5000 for the Second Consecutive Year as One of America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Rentex Computer & Audio Visual Rentals Makes Inc. 5000 for the Second Consecutive Year as One of America's Fastest-Growing Private Companies
text:
Rentex Inc., one of the most established providers of computer and audio visual equipment rentals in the nation, has earned the position of 3,822 on the 2015 Inc. 5000 list.
Canton, MA (PRWEB) September 29, 2015
Rentex Inc., one of the nation’s largest, most established wholesale providers of computer, audio visual & production rental equipment has announced that Inc. magazine has named it one of the Top 5000 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the country.
Inc. magazine ranked Rentex No. 3822 on its 34th annual Inc. 5000 list, an exclusive ranking of the nation’s fastest-growing private companies. This is the second straight year Rentex has made the list. In 2014, Rentex ranked No. 3882.
“We are extremely honored to be included on the Inc. 5000 list for the second year in a row,” stated Richard Flaherty III, President and CEO of Rentex Inc. “Our recognition as one of America’s fastest growing companies is a strong testament to the continued growth and success and speaks volumes about the quality of our company, services, and rental products. We would like to thank our loyal clients for their business, as well as our hard working employees, without whom this would not be possible.”
The 34th annual Inc. 5000 list takes a comprehensive look at the most important segment of the economy – America’s independent entrepreneurs. Compiled by percentage revenue growth over a three-year period, the 2015 list represents the most competitive group of privately-owned companies in Inc. 5000 history. 2015 honorees reported aggregate revenue of $205 billion, with job generation north of 647,000 over the past three years. Rentex Inc. joins an elite list of members including Fitbit, Smashburger, Bowlmor AMF, Planet Fitness, and Giftcards.com, Radio Flyer, Box, and Mindbody on the 2015 list.
Complete results of the 2015 Inc. 5000 list can be found at http://www.inc.com/5000 .
About Rentex
Founded in 1980, Rentex is one of the largest and most trusted wholesale providers of computer and audio visual rental equipment in the nation. Rentex is a longtime leader in the cross-rental market supplying many of the nation’s largest companies, tradeshows, meetings & events with complete computer and audio visual rentals and services. Rentex can deliver nationwide within 24 hours and same day delivery to most major cities. To view all available rental equipment and request a rental Quote: , visit http://www.rentex.com or call 800-574-1702.
